trait.name: Regeneration
text: As the trollkin shaman, but only regains 3 hp.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The trollkin grunt makes two attacks, either with its spear or its longbow.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
